meanings.sent1: She is the klutziest dancer in our class.
meanings.sent2: He felt like the klutziest person in the room when he dropped his tray.
meanings.sent3: Despite her best efforts, she always ends up being the klutziest one at the party.
meanings.sent4: His attempts to juggle multiple tasks made him feel like the klutziest clown in the circus.
meanings.sent5: The klutziest puppy in the litter tripped over its own paws.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a lack of coordination or grace
meanings.sent1: The klutziest cat I've ever seen kept knocking things off the table.
meanings.sent2: She tried to be graceful, but her movements were always the klutziest.
meanings.sent3: The klutziest waiter in the restaurant managed to spill drinks on every table.
meanings.sent4: His attempts at ballet were like watching the klutziest swan on a frozen pond.
meanings.sent5: The klutziest robot in the factory kept bumping into walls.
